A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have just registered onto this site to say what a steaming pile of sh×t this film was. I'm an avid SW fan and have posters up in my man cave to prove it. This film was so awful that I left the cinema after about 30 minutes as it felt like all the previous films have now been disregarded. The acting was laughable\, the jokes were terrible and watching Luke milk an alien cow and Leia regain consciousness in space and fly back to her ship were just too much for me. This franchise is now tv or a download at best.
